resources.string: cats share 95.6% of their genetic makeup with tigers
cats can jump 5 times their own height
cats can run 30 mph over short distances
male cats are commonly left pawed while female cats are right pawed
cats have 18 toes, 5 on their front paws and 4 on their back paws
the oldest cat to live was Creme Puff, who lived to be 38 years and 3 days old
cats have 32 muscles in each of their ears allowing them to rotate their ears 180 degrees
cats are short-sighted but have excellent peripheral vision
cat whiskers are connected to their muscular and nervous systems so they can detect changes in their surroundings
cats have a set of whiskers on the back of their front legs
the wealthiest cat in the world, Blackie, had a fortune of Â£7 million
cats usually sleep around an average of 15 hours per day which is 70% of their lives
in Ancient Egypt, family members would shave their eyebrows in mourning if their cat died
